 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָסַס‎</span>] **verb** ==moisten== (so Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רְסַס‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) ***sprinkle***); — 

**Qal** ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֶׁמֶן לָרֹס אֶתהַֿסֹּלֶת‎</span> [[Ezek.46.14|Ezek 46:14]].
